text: alm yaelam hwla' aladhin yajhadun whdanyt allah taealaa wasthqaqh wahdah alebadt, wykdhbwn rasulih mhmdana salaa allah ealayh wasalam ma hll balamm almkdhbt qablahum min hlak wtdmyr, waqad mknnahm fi al'ard ma lam numakin lakum 'ayuha alkafrwn, wanemna ealayhim b'inzal al'amtar wjryan al'anhar min taht msaknhm; astdrajana w'imla'an lhm, fakafaruu binaeam allah wakadhabuu alrsl, fa'ahlaknahum bsbb dhnwnhm, wa'anshana min baedihim ammana 'ukhraa khlfwhm fi emart alard?
